name: Zhentarim
beliefs: The Zhentarim, also known as the Black Network, seeks to amass wealth and power through whatever means necessary. They believe the world is a harsh place where only the strong survive, and that power — economic, political, or military — is the only reliable means of ensuring one's security.
goals: Extend the Zhentarim's influence and control
Grant members the ability to pursue their own interests while furthering the Network's agenda

ranks.title: Wolf
ranks.description: Trusted operative with access to Network resources.

ranks.title: Viper
ranks.description: Mid-level agent who runs local operations.

ranks.title: Ardragon
ranks.description: Regional commander who oversees multiple operations.

ranks.title: Dread Lord
ranks.description: One of the supreme leaders of the Black Network.

benefits.benefit: Access to Zhentarim fences who buy stolen goods at 50% value (no questions asked).
A Zhentarim contact in most major cities who can arrange meetings, loans, or muscle.
Can requisition 1d4 + 2 thugs or bandits for a mission.
A share of regional profits (50 gp per month) and command over local operatives.
Near-unlimited resources: can mobilize mercenary companies, assassins, or political agents.
